JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have 1-2 years of administrative experience and a project-oriented mindset? Do you thrive in an international setup, and would you enjoy working entirely remotely? Then follow this exciting opportunity and apply now!

We are looking for an independent team member for a project administrator/support position at one of the largest security companies in the world.

The job is a temporary position for 6 months.

The job
In your role as project administrator/support, you will work closely with our project managers and other stakeholders in a European Business Transformation team. The projects you will work with are carried out in an international setting and you will be working with team members across Europe. Your daily work includes coordination of various project activities, monitoring of progress, and overall project management support.
The job will be 100% remote. You will become part of an international team and you will get great opportunities to develop your professional skills and build up an interesting business profile.

General responsibilities
Task Management
• Help Project Managers with keeping track of tasks and activities within their projects
• Follow-up on team members and other stakeholders when needed, to ensure tasks are progressing
• Support with the alignment of activities between projects in the program

Time reporting and budget follow-up
• Ensure resources are reporting time
• Keep track that the time reported is within the project budget
• Support with budget updates and cost tracking
• Review incoming invoices before sent for approval

Presentations and documentation
• Support Project Managers with creating status reports in PowerPoint and other solutions that might be applicable
• Prepare presentation for Project Managers and support on general PowerPoint requests
• Support with creation of general project documentation like project charters, resource lists, budgets, etc.

Risk and issues
• Support with following up on risks or issues when needed
• Maintain RAID log

Meetings
• Manage meetings on behalf of Project Managers
• Help Project Managers with scheduling and planning of meetings
• Help Project Managers with minutes of meetings

Other Ad Hoc activities
• Other unplanned and unexpected tasks that the PMs need help with (workshop preparation, travel booking etc.)Detta söker vi:Qualifications
• Proven records in Microsoft Office (especially PowerPoint)
• English fluency, both written and verbal
• Relevant education Business Degree or previous job experience in the same area
• Basic project management understanding
• Ability to present a concise message in PowerPoint, being to the point, being able to know which level of detail is relevant for which target group

You are well organized and familiar with basic project management. You are a team player with good collaboration skills and strong communication skills. It is important, that you are proactive with the ability to prioritize your own time and tasks.

Practical information
We will be reviewing candidates on an ongoing basis, so do not hesitate to submit your English resumé. Please elaborate in your resumé on how you feel about working in an international setup from a remote position.
We are looking for profiles to start as soon as possible.

The job is a temporary position for 6 months.

For further information, please contact Recruiter, Monika Thomsen,
monika.thomsen@studentconsulting.com

We are looking forward to seeing you among the applicants!
